meanings.definition: A small cylinder of finely cut tobacco rolled in paper for smoking.
meanings.sent1: I saw him smoking a cigaret outside the store.
meanings.sent2: She always carries a cigaret in her purse.
meanings.sent3: The cigaret looked like a tiny stick of tobacco.
meanings.sent4: The smell of the cigaret lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: He flicked the cigaret ash onto the ground.

meanings.sent1: He decided to cigaret after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She cigaret slowly, enjoying the moment.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe you still cigaret despite the warnings.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was cigaret by the evening fog.
meanings.sent5: The campfire cigaret brightly in the dark night.

meanings.sent1: She is a regular cigaret and can't quit.
meanings.sent2: The cigaret outside the office takes breaks often.
meanings.sent3: The cigaret was the first to arrive at the smoking area.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the office cigaret due to his habit.
meanings.sent5: The group of friends included a cigaret who always had a pack handy.
